description:
This talk teaches four simple concepts to those who want to start
working on football data analysis:

#. How to access open event data from *statsbomb* API,
#. How to draw a soccer pitch using *mplsoccer*,
#. How to visualize a pass network map for a particular team in a
   particular game, and
#. How to use the *NetworkX* module to analyze the pass network (eg.
   finding out-degree distribution of passes, clustering coefficient,
   centrality, etc.)
title: Introduction to Soccer Pass Network Analysis with Python
